mapper.sql: ID, UNIQUE_ID, DAY_COUNT, MONTH, SALE, CUSTOMER_NUMBER, AGENT_NUMBER, TOTAL_TRX_COUNT, TRX_AMT, PROFIT_AMT, SALES_PRODUCT_CODE, PRODUCT_CODE, PROFIT_PRODUCT_TYPE, CUSTOMER_TYPE, MITANG_TRXAMT, MITANG_PROFIT_AMT, PERCENT, CALCULATE_STATUS, SUMMATION_ID, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME

update.foreach: update YMF_PROFIT set UNIQUE_ID = #{item.uniqueId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DAY_COUNT = #{item.dayCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, MONTH = #{item.month,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALE = #{item.sale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOMER_NUMBER = #{item.customerNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGENT_NUMBER = #{item.agentNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTAL_TRX_COUNT = #{item.totalTrxCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, TRX_AMT = #{item.trxAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROFIT_AMT = #{item.profitAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SALES_PRODUCT_CODE = #{item.salesProductCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_CODE = #{item.productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROFIT_PRODUCT_TYPE = #{item.profitProductType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOMER_TYPE = #{item.customerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MITANG_TRXAMT = #{item.mitangTrxamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MITANG_PROFIT_AMT = #{item.mitangProfitAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PERCENT = #{item.percent,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CALCULATE_STATUS = #{item.calculateStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUMMATION_ID = #{item.summationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_TIME = #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{item.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

mapper.select:
SELECT UNIQUE_ID FROM YMF_PROFIT P WHERE P.UNIQUE_ID IN
#{item}
